long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is the Beta version of a short script I wrote today, if it has a good reception I will update it with beautiful retina-burning graphics. Since the subreddit seems to lack an easy way of filtering posts by flair (It's in the wiki, not the side-bar) I have created this extension that allows you to filter posts by flair on the fly. WIP
